page.title: 07Clubs/Organisations
page.content:
A wide variety of clubs and organisations exists for children and adults. Scouts, Cubs, Guides and Brownies, together with a village Youth Club, Pantomime Group and Women's Institute group, all meet in the village hall which is run by a committee.
This committee raises funds throughout the year, through dances and sporting events, to help support the various groups. A village firework display in November is a popular annual event.
Other groups, such as the 'Searchers' youth group and the 'Tatworth Wives', are affiliated to the Parish Church and meet in the Church Room.
